data.context: Study investigates the effect of specific mutations on enzyme activity in a disease-relevant context.
data.overall_conclusion: The study defines the disease mechanism, employs a validated enzyme activity assay with controls and replicates, includes statistical analysis of the functional data, and calculates an OddsPath of 3.5 for this variant.

data.context: Study investigates protein-protein interactions in a disease model.
data.overall_conclusion: The study defines the disease mechanism, employs a protein interaction assay with controls and a commercial kit (but no replicates reported), and does not include statistical analysis of the functional data.

data.context: Study examines gene expression changes in a disease-relevant cell line.
data.overall_conclusion: The study defines the disease mechanism, employs a gene expression assay with controls but no replicates or accepted validation, and does not include statistical analysis of the functional data.

data.context: Study assesses cell phenotype rescue in a disease-relevant system.
data.overall_conclusion: The study defines the disease mechanism, employs a cell phenotype rescue assay with controls but no replicates or accepted validation, and does not include statistical analysis of the functional data.
